page.title: 12Local news in Bramley_1985
page.content:
NEWS REPORT by ANNA GRUNDY aged 10. APRIL 21st.,1985
{A blaze leaves four families homeless.
After a fire broke out at Sunnyside it left 4 families homeless. The fire started when Mr.and Mrs.Brooks went out.{They had left a gas bottle by {their open coal fire.}The gas bottle was leaking and it made a fire which spread up the wall and into the bedroom. It then set three more houses on fire.Then John and Steven McGuiness rescued a man trapped inside one of the blazing houses.The saved man was called Mr.Pepper. Six fire engines, from{Maltby Fire Station,}attended the fire. The fire did a great deal of damage and the four houses will have to be demolished.
